You are about to unlink the computer '' from your account. That computer will no longer stay in sync, but it will keep a copy of any file it currently has.

If you want to later re-link your computer to Dropbox, you can do so by right-clicking the Dropbox icon and choosing 'Link this computer...'
You are about to unlink your iPhone(s) from your account. The Dropbox app on your phone will require your account password before it allows access to your files. If you want to later re-link your iPhone you must re-enter your account password.
You are about to unlink your Android phone(s) from your account. The Dropbox app on your phone will require your account password before it allows access to your files. If you want to later re-link your phone you must re-enter your account password.
You are about to unlink your iPad(s) from your account. The Dropbox app on your iPad will require your account password before it allows access to your files. If you want to later re-link your iPad you must re-enter your account password.
You are about to unlink your BlackBerry(s) from your account. The Dropbox app on your BlackBerry will require your account password before it allows access to your files. If you want to later re-link your phone you must re-enter your account password.
Are you sure you want to uninstall ''? This app will no longer have permission to access your Dropbox.

Warning!

Two-step verification adds an extra layer of protection to your account. Whenever you sign in to the Dropbox website or link a new device, you'll need to enter both your password and also a security code sent to your mobile phone.

Learn more

For security, please enter your password for

How would you like to receive your security codes?

Learn more

Enter your mobile phone number

We'll send a security code to this phone whenever you sign in to the Dropbox website or link a new device.

An authenticator app lets you generate security codes on your phone without needing to receive text messages. If you don't already have one, we support any of these apps.

To configure your authenticator app:

  • Add a new time-based token.
  • Enter the secret key below, or scan a barcode instead.Use your app to scan the barcode below, or enter your secret key manually.

We sent a security code to . Enter it below to verify your phone number.

Enter the security code generated by your mobile authenticator app to make sure it's configured correctly.

Didn't receive a code?

Backup phone number (optional)

If you lose your primary phone, we can send a security code to your backup phone instead.

Your security codes will be sent by text message
Your security codes will be generated by your authenticator app
Primary phone number
Backup phone number

As a last resort, you can also use this emergency backup code to disable two-step verification and access your account.

Write this down and keep it safe

As a last resort, you can use this emergency backup code to disable two-step verification and access your account.

Write this down and keep it safe

From now on, when you sign in to the Dropbox website or link a new device, you'll need to enter a security code from your phone.

If you disable two-step verification, you'll only need your email and password when you sign in to the Dropbox website or link a new device.
